name: Can Connect
description: Returns Critical if the Agent cannot connect to the Vault endpoint, OK otherwise.

name: Unsealed OK
description: Returns Critical if the vault is sealed, OK otherwise.

name: Initialized OK
description: Returns Critical if the vault isn't initialized, OK otherwise.

name: Vault prometheus health
description: Returns `CRITICAL` if the check cannot access the Metrics endpoint. Returns `OK` otherwise. This service check is only available with the legacy mode (`use_openmetrics: false`).

name: OpenMetrics endpoint health
description: Returns `CRITICAL` if the Agent is unable to connect to the OpenMetrics endpoint, otherwise returns `OK`. This service check is only available with the latest mode (`use_openmetrics: true`).
